@_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency @AireIncinerator Later a site that was identified as unsuitable and unavailble in that test (despite being up for sale at the time) was also developed (also in a flood zone) by the same applicant!

tweets.text: @keighleyan @_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @EnvAgency The AVAI campaign achieved a lot. It's delayed this for 4 years. The contractor specified to build has since gone bust, views on incineration are changing nationally and an incineration tax could be on the horizon.

urls.title: Incinerator debated in Parliament
urls.description: Keighley and Ilkley MP Robbie Moore secured an adjournment debate in the House of Commons to criticise the decision made by the Environment Agency and Bradford Council over the Aire Valley Incinerator

tweets.text:
🏭😷This week, I raised my concerns about plans approved for #AireValleyIncinerator which were given green light by Labour run @bradfordmdc & @EnvAgency ❌

You can WATCH highlights👇& my full 20 min speech by visiting https://t.co/GShCkqEC2t

#Keighley #Ilkley @AireIncinerator https://t.co/1U0JOmrUF6
@CMPG @HighwaysWMIDS @EnvAgency In Eastern Europe, they’re allowed to do that.

M6 J12 to J13 a eagle eyed @HighwaysWMIDS who was monitoring the CCTV cameras notice the occupants of a Passat dumping rubbish in a ERA bay.  We intercepted the vehicle M6 J14 to J15 and escorted them back clear their rubbish up.  Details passed to @EnvAgency. 5419 https://t.co/5tWwYYiaDZ

tweets.text: @HMofBray @MariaHerlihyEA @MarkHill03 @EnvAgencySE I was a summer relief too ! I was 'let go' on my birthday of that year, but taken back on the following spring, and that was that ! I'll never forget my team leader coming to me at PH on Nov. 29th. I was thinking 'great he's come to tell me my contract has been extended .....' 🤣
@MariaHerlihyEA @MarkHill03 @EnvAgencySE I wish them all fair winds. Summer relief was how it started for me & look at the bother I got in over 6 years! 😆

I am reaching out to @EmmaHowardBoyd and @JamesBevanEA for help. I can’t seem to get anywhere with this. The @EnvAgency just don’t seen to recognise there is an issue on the River Mardyke. If anyone else knows how we can resolve this @HertsFarmer @InnesThomson https://t.co/AaTqYyV57K

Love to see this collaboration between both my employers, @GWNE & @NCLDoveMarine, and partners @EnvAgencyYNE & @BiomatrixWater!  🌊 Coming together to #MakeSpace4Nature and #monitor the progress. Can't wait to pass by on dog walks and see the succession! #NatureBasedSolutions https://t.co/STmOTYVSTP

Mark and I welcoming 11 of the new seasonal reliefs out of the 22 starters whilst undertaking their first aid training #Bishamsailingclub ,tomorrow training continues.Please say hi and welcome them when you pass through .⁦@MarkHill03⁩ ⁦@EnvAgencySE⁩ https://t.co/eqKaQ2HXPn
Hello @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia - just wondering who I speak to about a crop loss claim due to the sluice at Perfleet failing and flooding our land? Thanks. https://t.co/3qnblETfCb

An enquiry&review of standards is needed @BorisJohnson If the standards permit a landfill of that size by homes then the standards are wholly irresponsible&need https://t.co/Axu4qjBnVX only have to see it for alarm bells to ring,we  need to learn lessons @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/1tE1YqgD7K

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text: Really really sad, we’ve been lucky the last few days but have been in exactly the same position waking with nausea & the air thick with the distinctive hydrogen sulphide fumes. Frightening situation for us. Act now @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe https://t.co/zc4r6CGlEw
@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  @ClareDinnisEA  The smell from. @RedIndustries2 from 1.30ish to 8am was horrendous. Why cant @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency do something to stop it. @StinkStopthe #walleys

@P1Photography @WYFRS @YorkshireWater @WYFRSKirkTeam @Calderdale @KirkleesCouncil @bradfordmdc @MyWakefield @leedsemergency @EnvAgencyYNE @nationaltrust @MarsdenmoorNT Why waste your time typing this bollocks? What a sad individual.

Hi @RachSalv, can you help us? We're a community plagued by noxious gasses coming from a poorly run landfill that is far to close to houses. Easily the most complained about site in the UK and the @EnvAgencyMids failed us for years. Can you help?

When poisonous fumes invade my house my throat is sore&I need to use my asthma inhalers.They often come at night.I can’t sleep with the fear&anxiety of what it’s doing to my young son.When will you act?@EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe 04.23 it woke us up, feeling sick, can't breathe thru that stench, so I'll ask @EnvAgency again, where is our place of safety to evacuate to to breathe clean air instead of toxic fumes from Whalleys quarry   landfill

Newcastle under Lyme residents calling the @EnvAgency between 2&4:30am last night as the smell was so bad they couldn’t sleep! This is an atrocious quality of life & how are they expected to work today? Time for change @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe

Chose the right day to get my line manager on site! Work progressing well at Backstone Beck and the wildlife was a bonus! @bradfordmdc @Bradford_CROW @EnvAgencyYNE @moorsforfuture @SCORE_NSR @daleslandnet https://t.co/pigw10herp

Works are progressing well to repair a #flood embankment next to the Sloop Inn at Temple Hirst, #Selby on the lower River Aire. This is part of our £10 million programme of repair works following the February 2020 floods. #FCERM https://t.co/XZdce16kQx

My blog COVID-mania & Truth of life (https://t.co/zCxYBzUoSG) got published in ACTA SCIENTIFIC Pharmacology, a scientific Journal, as COVID Mania and Truth of Life. Have you read it? (https://t.co/RldHUVzFz5).
Enjoy reading, Why Covid-19 does not spread through political rallies?

tweets.text:
Are you a registered waste carrier?

We’ve developed a simple online tool that you can add to your website to show you're registered with us.

This helps your customers easily check at a glance you’re registered to carry waste legally.

Find out how here: https://t.co/iEgBuUxK8m https://t.co/BFdgrJfwlr

tweets.text: 15 year anniversary of my time with NT. What better way to spend the day than with brilliant teams across the North East. I was only meant to be with NT for 3 years! @NT_TheNorth https://t.co/Bys5QKpEl6

Got to be the final project of 20-21! A strange old year but good things achieved across @EnvAgencySW Devon and Cornwall. The final countdown sees another surface velocity radar install complete at Tiverton
This one is to help issue flood warnings and reduce flood risk locally. https://t.co/LFsNUtZhpY

New watercourse connected and the slate roofed culvert now decommissioned on our #nfm contract Nr Hawkshead #lakedistrictnationalpark The sun is out and its now time to finish the bunds! @SCRiversTrust @CumbriaCC #llfa @NTsouthlakes  @EnvAgencyNW #slowtheflow https://t.co/ZH7eukPRRD

@WYFRS @YorkshireWater @WYFRSKirkTeam @Calderdale @KirkleesCouncil @bradfordmdc @MyWakefield @leedsemergency @EnvAgencyYNE @nationaltrust @MarsdenmoorNT Arnt they our moors... Our tax payer.. Ppl owned moors... I mean common sense says don't as you can burn it down.. But it'd our property... Unless part of it is owned by a rich arestacrat

@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids one week with no stench, no inhaler and no pregnancy problems. Tonight is as bad as it was end of Feb and I’m lying here on my spacer and having the same pains I did when I was rushed to hospital just over a week ago. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

urls.title: Living Landscapes Assistant: River Derwent | Yorkshire Wildlife Trust
urls.description: Are you self-motivated and able to manage your own time effectively whilst also able to work as part of a team? Do you have good knowledge of land management principals and a strong commitment to nature conservation? If the answer is ‘yes’, then we have an exciting opportunity for you.

tweets.text: We're recruiting! Our team is looking for an enthusiastic and dynamic person to help deliver a wide range of projects across the Derwent Catchment! For more information visit:  https://t.co/3SO2OzwIru Closing date: 12th April. @LDV_NNR @northyorkmoors @EnvAgencyYNE @YorksWildlife https://t.co/eUe9E2hjPH

tweets.text:
We’re working hard to tackle #WasteCrime. 

We’ve developed a new tool that makes it easier for you to know if your waste carrier is registered with us. 

Find out more here: https://t.co/l4EG6rV1DW

At the start (early 90’s) I saw the intro of DoC. Customers took it seriously, audited waste streams, inspected permits and witnessed disposals. Then ⁦@EnvAgency failed to enforce it for 30 years & producers failed to respect it. https://t.co/0NfEDn52d9

We're working with @yorkshire_dales, @YorkDalesRT, @WildTroutTrust, @UniversityLeeds, and @EnvAgencyYNE as part of the ‘Keep Ure Rivers Cool’ project, planting riparian #trees at priority sites along the Ure catchment!🌳⬇️

https://t.co/gKenQEDPhb https://t.co/Wu1J1VDIzs

Sadly, @Feargal_Sharkey makes a good point.  More incompetence from @DefraGovUK and the same old problem of them - and their paid acolytes @EnvAgency -  being woeful at enforcing existing environmental laws. https://t.co/7L4cUVJbOh

Local people feel like their homes are a “prison” due to landfill fumes.Incredibly sad after the first warm spring day yesterday when ‘outdoor’ meet ups are mandatory @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice what are you going to do about it? U cannot stay silent! @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: A glorious day for natural flood management work at Backstone Beck and #Ilkley Moor with @bradfordmdc @IlkleyOf #nfm https://t.co/uUzUzJMqs4 https://t.co/t6u4qJGxaB

Regional Rural Crime Operation last night, working with @NPSpecials  @EnvAgencyYNE  and Rural Crime Volunteers.  A number of vehicles checked, however all were in order on this occasion. #RuralCrime #Farmwatch @NPJaniceHutton #TeamNorthern

After the modelling work with @YorkshireiCASP the monitoring with @SCORE_NSR @daleslandnet it’s so good to see @moorsforfuture undertaking the moorland works on this @bradfordmdc & @EnvAgencyYNE NFM project 👏🏼 https://t.co/a1BHGuf0xt

Today 25 pioneering projects have received a share of £150 million of funding to test new approaches to flood risk management in a #ClimateCrisis. Here’s my blog about the whole programme: https://t.co/FK8ljCD0yj #adaptourworld #COP26 #TogetherforOurPlanet https://t.co/MJTTuIb4Ck

Suns shining today while we install a @BiomatrixWater floating ecosystem into #royalquaysmarina can’t wait to collaborate with @NCLDoveMarine to quantify the biodiversity gains from this innovative system #teamea @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @GWKNE https://t.co/LnJnIsg99M
@paul360m @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @johncurtinEA It is open for navigation but there is minor disruption hope that helps
@MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @johncurtinEA Great work! Is Cookham lock now open pls!? Thanks!

A fantastic competition with the help of @RCheesemakers thanks! @equa_mat @EquaMat @DioSalisbury @SDBE_Update @CofE_Education @GretaThunberg @EnvAgencySW #environment #savetheplanet https://t.co/bl3wuusdbH
